Claim: "Salmon are crucial to their coastal ecosystem."
Implication: "Without salmon, the largest trees on Earth wouldn't exist."
Referring expressions: Salmon, their coastal ecosystem.  Salmon, Earth, largest trees
Formula: (exists b (exists a (IsCrucialTo(a,b)))) -> (exists d (exists c (exists a (IsWithout(a,c) and (AreLargestTreesOnEarth(d) or ~IsOnEarth(d))))))
